name: GoodVibe
0:
”Alexa open Good Vibe”
”Alexa tell Good Vibe good morning”
”Alexa ask Good Vibe to play my guitar recording”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good vibe
des:
Create custom commands and responses for Amazon Alexa. You configure the phrase that will trigger the command and how Alexa should respond. The response can be anything from a greeting, a joke or a short story to playing an audio file of your choice or your recorded voice. 

You can create commands using the voice interface, just say "Alexa tell Good Vibe" followed by your command. You can also use the web application alexavibe.com where you can manage your commands and include special elements like audio or microphone recordings in your responses. 

With personalized commands, you can cheer up yourself and your close ones, have fun with family and surprise friends. 

Bring in the Good Vibe!
